title: Designing Mathematics Educational Technology Using Environmental Factors and Imagination

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematical concepts and problem-solving experience required in professional fields
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, aims to strengthen applied mathematics skills for professionals

learning_goals: Design a project to transform real workplace problems into mathematical models with over 80% completion
Analyze diverse environmental factors (physical/organizational/social/human) and propose three or more creative math problem-solving strategies
Write and share five or more feedbacks stimulating mathematical imagination in a collaborative peer environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
